Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Sharia law is now legal in all 50 states when it is not.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Sharia law is not in effect in any U.S. states.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or factual basis to support the assertion that Sharia law is legal in all 50 states.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that a satirical website's fictional story is true.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement in the claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times by relying on false information and fabricated sources.
Exist alternative explanation: There is no alternative explanation presented in the claim.
